item.description:
“Death Dinner”

Come join us for a lively
Pot Luck where we’re putting
“Death” right on the table!

Share some wonderful hearty food
while discussing our questions, concerns, traditions, lessons, experiences etc. about death.

We gotta eat and we’re gonna die . . .
Lets celebrate it together.

Sunday, November 7, 2010
6:00 pm

at the home of
Joyce Cassidy O’Reilly
7 Ashwood Lane
Falmouth, ME
(in the Woodlands)

All are welcome up to our limit of 25
Please RSVP so we can organize food and beverages

Deena 617-529-2255


Directions: from 295, take Exit 10 – Bucknam Road. Bear RIGHT, go over 295. Turn RIGHT onto Rte 9, bearing LEFT at the fork, and turning LEFT onto Woods Roads at the blinking yellow light. After .9 miles, turn LEFT into the Woodlands. Take the first LEFT, onto Oakmont Drive. Take the 1st RIGHT onto Old Oak Way. This becomes Ashwood Lane. Condo is the unit on the left, in the 2nd building on the right. Park in the guest spots, and in the driveway, or along Ashwood.
item.name: Death Dinner
